Class.name: Forum.Forum
Class.Description: Class of objects Object of this class are cathegories from forum with next properties ForumName - name of cathegory Address - piece of URL; like /cache/, /oracle/, /mysql/ Topics - Amount of topics of cathegory

UDLText.name: T
UDLText.Content: // Relationship Topics As Forum.Topic [ Cardinality = many, Inverse = Forum ];

Method.name: Load
Method.Description: Load cathegory, then load topics of cathegory Repeat
Method.Implementation:
;#For time we will have in properties of this class only this data s tmpData = ..%New() s tmpData.ForumName = "Cache" s tmpData.Address = cathegoryURL s tmpData.TopicsNum = 3277 d tmpData.%Save()
d ##class(Forum.Topic).TopicLoad(cathegoryURL) Q
